name: Dab, Twerk & Dance
description:
Dab, Twerk & Dance What else do you need in life? Well, perhaps your rich boyfriends club house as well as your freedom!
Your boyfriend is at work, you got all day to yourself. What would you do? Well, dabbing, twerking and dancing sounds like a great idea!

In this experience you shall be able to perform different animations (Press: T, G, B and Y to use) and explore the house! Main objective is to relax, unwind and perform your favorite actions in-game! Enjoy!Features:
  • Realistic 3d female model
  • Realistic animations
  • Complete freedom
  • Huge & Accessible Club House

Note: We are planning on adding public multiplayer servers along with voice chat and custom characters (pool party, etc.). Stay tuned for updates!
